overview: Parth Shah works as a Software Developer at Yahoo! in Sunnyvale, CA. He graduated from Carnegie Mellon University in 2009 with a MS in Computer Engineering. At CMU, he studied a broad range of CS/ECE topics ranging from networks, distributed systems, embedded systems and mobile application development. He loves to develop iPhone/iPad applications during his spare time. When not with his Mac, he can be found at the gym or playing beach volleyball. Being a true hacker at heart, he was mad about robotics during his undergrad back in India and has won several national competitions. Parth likes getting in touch with people in the geek/entrepreneurial community and is an aspiring entrepreneur himself.
